actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code, to provide for exclusive remedy against the United States in suits based upon acts or omissions of U.S. employees.

summary.text: Provides for an exclusive remedy against the United States in suits based upon acts or omissions of United States employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code, to provide for exclusive remedy against the United States in suits based upon acts or omissions of U.S. employees.
